Package org.helixj.wallet.listeners

Interface WalletEventListener

All Superinterfaces:
KeyChainEventListener, ScriptsChangeEventListener, TransactionConfidenceEventListener, WalletChangeEventListener, WalletCoinsReceivedEventListener, WalletCoinsSentEventListener, WalletReorganizeEventListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractWalletEventListener, NativeWalletEventListener
@Deprecated
public interface WalletEventListener
extends KeyChainEventListener, WalletChangeEventListener, WalletCoinsReceivedEventListener, WalletCoinsSentEventListener, WalletReorganizeEventListener, ScriptsChangeEventListener, TransactionConfidenceEventListener
Deprecated.
Use the superinterfaces directly instead.

Common interface for wallet changes and transactions.
